archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.4.5d: d) immediately report actual and suspected security incidents relating to the device (e.g. loss or theft of the device, or unauthorised disclosure of information) to a helpdesk, specialist IT team/department or equivalent
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
